files.help:
Export the following environment variables:

```bash
export TEXMFCONFIG="$XDG_CONFIG_HOME"/texlive/texmf-config
```

Export the following environment variables:

```bash
export TEXMFVAR="$XDG_CACHE_HOME"/texlive/texmf-var
```

Export the following environment variables:

```bash
export TEXMFHOME="$XDG_DATA_HOME"/texmf
```
